article_title: True emergency? Woman with Covered California plan dealing with $33,000 hospital bill
article_text: The Affordable Care Act, signed into law in 2010, put health insurance within reach of millions of Americans. But we still have an insurance-based health system and all of those rules apply to consumers. A Modesto woman is caught in dispute over $33,000 hospital bill

article_summary:
A Modesto woman is caught in dispute over $33,000 hospital bill
But we still have an insurance-based health system and all of those rules apply to consumers.
The Affordable Care Act, signed into law in 2010, put health insurance within reach of millions of Americans.
